record.text:
Thank you for joining Bluesky, we‚Äôre happy you‚Äôre here!

Our full Terms of Service and other policy documents are linked below:

Another day at Bluesky, and it looks like growth is not slowing down! Welcome!

We‚Äôd like to take a moment to share our stance on AI and user data:

Bluesky uses AI internally to assist in content moderation, which helps us triage posts and shield human moderators from harmful content. We also use AI in the Discover algorithmic feed to serve you posts that we think you‚Äôd like.

None of these are Gen AI systems trained on user content.

Bluesky uses AI internally to assist in content moderation, which helps us triage posts and shield human moderators from harmful content. We also use AI in the Discover algorithmic feed to serve you posts that we think you‚Äôd like.

None of these are Gen AI systems trained on user content.

Another day at Bluesky, and it looks like growth is not slowing down! Welcome!

We‚Äôd like to take a moment to share our stance on AI and user data:

A number of artists and creators have made their home on Bluesky, and we hear their concerns with other platforms training on their data. We do not use any of your content to train generative AI, and have no intention of doing so.

If you continue to see "Invalid Handle" for a while and you've recently updated your username to use your website, you may need to reverify it. 

In the meantime, give it a moment to resolve on its own üôè

value.text:
One part of our upgraded infrastructure may affect your profile.

If you see your handle now says ‚ÄúInvalid handle,‚Äù please reverify it by navigating to Settings > Change my handle > Type in your current handle > Verify DNS Record > Update.

(Basically, update to the same handle.)

record.text:
Here‚Äôs a few things you can expect temporarily when there‚Äôs an outage:

- ‚ÄúInvalid Handle‚Äù everywhere
- Likes don‚Äôt seem to work (they‚Äôre just being slow)
- Your post isn‚Äôt showing up (same, just being slow)
- Random errors or blank screens, the usual app broken stuff

Site now recovered

Btw ‚Äî Today will get interesting! If the site goes down, maybe grab a soda, pet the kitty. We‚Äôll hit it with a wrench as fast as we can

It also ranks at #3 in the UK.
